query:
UPDATE island_guides 
SET 
  topThingsToDo = JSON_ARRAY(
    JSON_OBJECT('title', 'Water Sports & Adventure', 'description', 'Experience adrenaline-pumping activities like parasailing, jet skiing, fun tube rides, and wakeboarding.'),
    JSON_OBJECT('title', 'Snorkeling & Diving', 'description', 'Explore the Maafushi Reef, or take trips to see shipwrecks and nurse sharks.'),
    JSON_OBJECT('title', 'Excursions', 'description', 'Take a boat trip to a nearby sandbank, go dolphin watching, or enjoy a full-day, multi-island hopping tour.'),
    JSON_OBJECT('title', 'Relaxation & Beaches', 'description', 'Spend time on the designated Bikini Beach (a premier, scenic spot) or visit the Water Sports Beach.'),
    JSON_OBJECT('title', 'Spa & Culture', 'description', 'Indulge in local spa services like Aquzz Spa and enjoy barbecue nights with Boduberu cultural dances.'),
    JSON_OBJECT('title', 'Dining & Shopping', 'description', 'Explore local souvenir shops, such as Angolo Souvenir shop, and dine at varied restaurants, including Bandharu Kada and Blossom Cafe.'),
    JSON_OBJECT('title', 'Resort Day Trips', 'description', 'Visit a nearby luxury resort for the day to experience a different kind of Maldivian luxury.')
  ),
  foodCafes = JSON_ARRAY(
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Bandharu Kada', 'type', 'Local Restaurant', 'description', 'Authentic Maldivian food and local cuisine'),
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Blossom Cafe', 'type', 'Casual Dining', 'description', 'International and local dishes'),
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Angolo Souvenir Shop', 'type', 'Shopping & Dining', 'description', 'Local souvenir shop with unique gifts and souvenirs'),
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Beachfront Restaurants', 'type', 'Dining', 'description', 'Various beachfront restaurants with scenic views')
  ),
  attractions = JSON_ARRAY(
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Bikini Beach', 'description', 'Premier scenic shoreline known for its unique white polished pebbles and excellent surfing/skimboarding conditions'),
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Water Sports Beach', 'description', 'Designated beach for water sports activities and recreation'),
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Aquzz Spa', 'description', 'Local spa services offering relaxation and wellness treatments'),
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Maafushi Reef', 'description', 'Popular snorkeling and diving destination with vibrant coral reefs')
  ),
  healthTips = JSON_ARRAY(
    'Bring reef-safe sunscreen to protect marine life',
    'Stay hydrated in the tropical climate',
    'Wear water shoes when entering the reef',
    'Get travel insurance that covers water sports activities'
  )
WHERE slug = 'maafushi'
command:
